City Council

The Taft City Council holds regular meetings on the first and third Tuesdays of each month at 6:30 P.M. Unless otherwise noted, meetings take place at City Hall, located at 230 Green Avenue. Public participation is encouraged.

2026 2025 2024 2023 2022 2021 2020 2019 Earlier 2026

The Buildings and Standards Commission meets as needed to address building and code violations brought before the commission. Unless otherwise noted, meetings take place at City Hall, 230 Green Ave.

The Taft Economic Development Corporation (Taft EDC) holds regular meetings on the second Tuesday of each month at 5:30 P.M. Unless otherwise noted, meetings take place at City Hall, located at 230 Green Avenue.

The City of Taft Planning & Zoning Board holds regular meetings on the third Tuesday of each month at 6:30P.M. Unless otherwise noted, meetings take place at City Hall, located at 230 Green Avenue.

The Taft Quality Improvement Corporation (TQIC) holds regular meetings on the second and fourth Thursday of each month at 6:30 P.M. Unless otherwise noted, meetings take place at City Hall, located at 230 Green Avenue.
